title: Land for Sale in Malabe near SLIIT
details:
A rectangle block of 6.0 Perch land in a calm and quiet environment in Kiribathgalawatta Rd (in front of Don’s Bakers and Restaurant) , Malabe is for urgent sale. 3 minutes to SLIIT. Good residential neighborhood. Ideal to construct a luxury house or a student dormitory. Cash buyers only and no brokers.

Please contact weekdays after 6.00 pm to 9.00pm or weekends 8.00 am to 9.00pm
